title: QIP-3: The first community vote of QUSD for new collateral assets listing
body:
Detailed discussion please refer to the post:
EN version: https://forum.qian.finance/t/qip-3-the-first-community-vote-of-qusd-for-new-collateral-assets-listing/296
CN version: https://forum.qian.finance/t/qip-3-qusd/297

Key reminders:

The core development team now initiates a formal vote.

This vote adopts the "vote out mechanism". Community members vote for the token that they oppose listing, and the top 20% tokens with the highest number of votes will be disqualified from listing.

For example, a total of 7 tokens were selected for voting, of which 5 tokens were voted for out. Since 7 × 20% = 1.4, the approximate value is 2, so the top 2 tokens with the most against votes will be disqualified for this round of listing.

There is another vote option: "support all the above tokens". If this option gets more than 80% of the votes, or no token gets against vote, all candidate tokens can be listed.

Tokens that are disqualified in this round can join in the next round of listing vote without going through the forum discussion.

The time duration of voting: 48 hours

This vote is on the Ethereum network, only vote for candidates of Ethereum.

详细论坛讨论：
英文版：https://forum.qian.finance/t/qip-3-the-first-community-vote-of-qusd-for-new-collateral-assets-listing/296
中文版：https://forum.qian.finance/t/qip-3-qusd/297

重点提示：

核心开发团队发起正式投票。

本次投票采取“前排淘汰制”，社区用户将票投给自己反对上币的币种，获得票数最高的前20%币种将被取消上币资格。

举例，一共有7种代币入选投票，其中5种代币都获得了投票反对，由于 7 × 20% = 1.4 ，取近似值为 2 ，因此获得反对票最多的前 2 种代币，将被取消本轮上币资格。

投票选项还有一个为：“支持上述所有币种”，如果该选项获得的票数超过80%，或者没有币种获得反对票，则所有候选代币都可以获得上币资格。

本轮上币被淘汰的币种，可以参加下一轮上币的投票，不用再经过论坛讨论环节。

投票时限：48小时

该投票为以太坊网络抵押资产专场。
choices: Against the WBTC（反对上架 WBTC）
Against the WETC（反对上架 WETC）
Against the renBTC（反对上架 renBTC）
Against the Ren（反对上架 renBTC）
Against the renBCH（反对上架 renBCH）
Against the renZEC（反对上架 renZEC）
Against the tBTC（反对上架 tBTC）
Against the CRV（反对上架 CRV）
Against the HUSD（反对上架 HUSD）
同意上述所有代币上架
author: 0xDb80BD4f295623D50c2019581624454d07f070be
